channel.title: Wilderness errors on rishscape source
channel.description:
Ok ive been using Richscape's source for a while now and now when i do tests in the wild theres some serious bugs. One is that when you attack the other person they stop attacking you. Then when they attack you you stop attacking them and so on.
Another is you don't receive any xp in the wild.
Could someone please tell me how fix these i would very much appreciate it!

item.title: Wilderness errors on rishscape source
item.dc:creator: @bmxscape bmxscape
item.description:
@bmxscape wrote:

I don’t know what i would of added to make it cause that though?

Read full topic

item.title: Wilderness errors on rishscape source
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

bmxscape:

Ok ive been using Richscape’s source for a while now and now when i do tests in the wild theres some serious bugs. One is that when you attack the other person they stop attacking you. Then when they attack you you stop attacking them and so on.

I haven’t seen this bug, maybe it’s something you’re doing that’s causing it?

bmxscape:

Another is you don’t receive any xp in the wild.

Edit the Attack method.

Read full topic

item.title: Wilderness errors on rishscape source
item.dc:creator: @Brazil_pkr10 Brazil pkr10
item.description:
@Brazil_pkr10 wrote:

sorry, i cant, but why dont you get another source? Richscape look so Futurist and different of Runescape. Atleast the last version looks.

Use my Compiler it ownz

@echo off
COLOR F0
Title Compiler
echo Compile Complete by Rafas / Rafascape hamachi
echo Specially created to You and Everyone
echo Have fun with your Server!
echo Checking Java version…
:checkjava
echo 06
if exist “C:/program files/java/jdk1.5.0_06/bin/javac.exe” goto java6
echo 07
if exist “C:/program files/java/jdk1.5.0_07/bin/javac.exe” goto java7
echo 08
if exist “C:/program files/java/jdk1.5.0_08/bin/javac.exe” goto java8
echo 09
if exist “C:/program files/java/jdk1.6.0_11/bin/javac.exe” goto java9
echo 10
if exist “C:/program files/java/jdk1.5.0_16/bin/javac.exe” goto java10

:java6
echo.
echo compiling…
echo java version: 1.5.0_06
echo.
“C:/program files/java/jdk1.5.0_06/bin/javac.exe” *.java -nowarn *.java
goto end

:java7
echo.
echo compiling…
echo java version: 1.5.0_07
echo.
“C:/program files/java/jdk1.5.0_07/bin/javac.exe” *.java -nowarn *.java
goto end

:java8
echo.
echo compiling…
echo java version: 1.5.0_08
echo.
“C:/program files/java/jdk1.5.0_08/bin/javac.exe” *.java -nowarn *.java
goto end

:java9
echo.
echo compiling…
echo java version: 1.6.0_11
echo.
“C:/program files/java/jdk1.6.0_11/bin/javac.exe” *.java -nowarn *.java
goto end

:java10
echo.
echo compiling…
echo java version: 1.5.0_16
echo.
“C:/program files/java/jdk1.5.0_16/bin/javac.exe” *.java -nowarn *.java
goto end

:end
echo.
echo Complete!
echo.
set recomp=
set /p recomp= press enter to close
goto close

:close
echo.
echo closing compiler…

Read full topic
